unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed it bad after that hailstorm in Punjab on 12/04/2023! Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, but bureaucracy, yaar! Application process at 14:00 hrs, 20/04/2023 was killer! Hope payout is decent this time, like Rs. 10,000 per acre at least. Last time in Maharashtra, in 2022, payout was delayed until Diwali. My Kisaan credit card is waiting. Jai Jawan Jai Kisan! Need that payout before 15/08 to buy seeds for next season. This year it rained only 500 mm instead of 800mm!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed it bad after that hailstorm in Punjab on twelfth april two thousand and twenty three! Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, but bureaucracy, yaar! Application process at two post meridiem, twentieth april two thousand and twenty three was killer! Hope payout is decent this time, like rupee ten thousand per acre at least. Last time in Maharashtra, in two thousand and twenty two, payout was delayed until Diwali. My Kisaan credit card is waiting. Jai Jawan Jai Kisan! Need that payout before fifteenth august to buy seeds for next season. This year it rained only five hundred millimeter instead of eight hundred millimeter!
